server

Class Reise

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Reise

  • public class Reise
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a journey used by the ReiseServer.
    Author:
    erik heinisch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reise(java.lang.String ziel, int max)
      Calls the other constructor and add the parameter null for the String[] to match the conditions of Reise(String ziel, int max, String[] teilnehmer).
      Reise(java.lang.String ziel, int max, java.lang.String[] teilnehmer)
      Synchronizes the values of its parameters with the attributes in the class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reise

        public Reise(java.lang.String ziel,
     int max,
     java.lang.String[] teilnehmer)
        Synchronizes the values of its parameters with the attributes in the class.
        Parameters:
        ziel - a String representing the place where the journey is going to.
        max - an Integer representing the maximal number of people traveling in this journey.
        teilnehmer - a String[] that includes the names of all travelers.

      • Reise

        public Reise(java.lang.String ziel,
     int max)
        Calls the other constructor and add the parameter null for the String[] to match the conditions of Reise(String ziel, int max, String[] teilnehmer).
        Parameters:
        ziel - a String representing the place where the journey is going to.
        max - an Integer representing the maximal number of people traveling in this journey.

    • Method Detail

      • anzahlPlaetze

        public int anzahlPlaetze()
        Finds out how many people can travel in this journey maximal.
        Returns:
        an Integer "max" that tells you about the maximum number of people who can travel in this journey.

      • freiePlaetze

        public int freiePlaetze()
        Finds out how much traveling places are still free in a journey.
        Returns:
        an Integer that represents the amount of free places in the journey.

      • getTeilnehmerListe

        public java.lang.String[] getTeilnehmerListe()
        Return´s the names of all travelers connected to the journey.
        Returns:
        a String[] that includes the names of all travelers connected to this journey.

      • hinzufuegenTeilnehmer

        public boolean hinzufuegenTeilnehmer(java.lang.String name)
        Add´s a traveler to the Reise to do so the traveler gets sorted in the established list by name ascending.
        Parameters:
        name - a String that represents the name of the person to add in the easylist of the Reise object.
        Returns:
        a boolean that represents the success of the method: if true = method successful if false = method failed.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String with all persons on the Reise. The String is started by ";" and all names are also seperated by an ";" its implemented this way because the method is used to complete the String which is written in the reisen.txt file by the ReiseContainer.speichern() method to represent this Reise object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        alleTeilnehmer a String that includes all Teilnehmer out of the easylist ( first element = ersterTeilnehmer.
        See Also:
        java.lang.String.toString()} Similar kind of method.

      • getZiel

        public java.lang.String getZiel()
        Getter method for the private String ziel.
        Returns:
        the direction of the journey.

      • setZiel

        public void setZiel(java.lang.String ziel)
        Setter method for the private String ziel.
        Parameters:
        "ziel" - the direction to set for the journey.
